headline: Baxter to Present at 43rd Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., December 18, 2024--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a global medtech leader, will present at the 43rd Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 13, 2025. José (Joe) E. Almeida, Baxter's chair, president and chief executive officer, is scheduled to present at 10:30 a.m. Pacific Time.
